short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An application to help kids with spelling! Developed by the CAST team at Boise State University.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension uses a spellchecker specially made for children to help them search! 

This tool was developed by the CAST team at Boise State University (https://cast.boisestate.edu/). CAST is an internet search user interface tailored to the skills and needs of children ranging from 6-11 years old.

With this extension you can use our spellchecker on other search engines like Google and Bing!
